text: Cyrillia zamponorum is a species of sea snail, a marine gastropod mollusk in the family Raphitomidae.MolluscaBase eds. (2020). MolluscaBase. Cyrillia zamponorum (Horro, Gori & Rolán, 2019). Accessed through: World Register of Marine Species at: http://www.marinespecies.org/aphia.php?p=taxdetails&id;=1389231 on 2020-05-02 ==Description== ==Distribution== This marine species occurs in the Atlantic Ocean, the Gulf of Guinea off Sao Tome and Principe. ==References== * Horro, J.; Rolán, E.; Gori, S. (2019). Raphitoma zamponorum a new species from São Tome Island (Gastropoda: Raphitomidae). Iberus. 37(1): 1–6.. ==External links== * Fassio, G.; Russini, V.; Pusateri, F.; Giannuzzi-Savelli, R.; Høisæter, T.; Puillandre, N.; Modica, M. V.; Oliverio, M. (2019). An assessment of Raphitoma and allied genera (Neogastropoda: Raphitomidae). Journal of Molluscan Studies. 85(4): 414-425 zamponorum Category:Gastropods described in 2019
title: Cyrillia zamponorum
